channel.title: parenting on The Hydrant
channel.description: Recent content in parenting on The Hydrant

item.title: Learning English
item.description: Mireille has been in the US for around 2 months now and by all accounts is doing pretty well. One thing that we constantly worry about is whether she is picking up English quickly enough. Of course we are on all these Facebook groups and we constantly hear about how much English people's kids are picking up and Mireille has been a bit slow on that front. I tend to think many of those people are embellishing their stories quite a bit, but whatever - she is a strong willed girl and she's going to speak Lingala, dammit!
